bike.description: New 2014 Frame Design, Lightweight 6066 Aluminum Floval Tubing, Internally-machined Integrated Head Tube, 3D-Forged Dropouts

components.description: Full Cr-Mo Landing Gear, Tapered Legs
180mm Forged Alloy 2-pc w/ Alloy 39T Chainring, Integrated Sealed External BB, Hollow Axle
X-Pedo Low-profile Platform w/ Removable Pins
Sealed Bearing Hollow Axle Alloy Hubs w/ Alienation Deviant F & Alientaion Black Sheep R, 36H Double-Wall Rims, 17T Cassette, Stainless Spokes
Tioga Power Block 24" x 1.75" F, 20" x 1.60" R
Promax P-1 6061 T-6 Alloy V-Brake, Slick Cable
Cr-Mo SE Racing Floval Bar, 28" x 6.5"
SE Front-Load Alloy, Lightweight External Cutouts, Hidden Top Cap
SE Racing Mushroom Wing Grip w/ SE Rubber End Plugs
